title: Coming Full Circle
description: What if Bella realized she loved Jacob enough? Jacob is injured in the battle with the newborns. Bella now knows she loves him, but not enough to leave Edward. Or is it? Who will she choose, and what will the Volturi do? MATURE THEMES,LEMONS! POST-ECLIPSEhttps://www.fanfiction.net/s/4655012/...
author: toooldforthis
